snippet.title: Tainted Grail: Conquest (PC) - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1199030/Tainted_Grail/
Wishlist on GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/tainted_grail
Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/eRFF7Tm

Tainted Grail: Conquest is a hardcore roguelike experience with base-building mechanics and a surprising narrative. Create unique combos out of various skills, runes, and items. Develop and customize your heroes as you fight harder and harder enemies. Build and upgrade your village to carry over your progress and tailor the experience to your unique playstyle.

An ADDITIONAL GAME MODE to Tainted Grail!

###

Soundtrack to this trailer is based on this track (and check out the whole album because it's AWESOME!):

Band Name: Sowulo
Trackname: Wulfwiga
Genre: Atmospheric Dark Folk
Country: Netherlands
Bandcamp: https://sowulo.bandcamp.com
YouTube: https://youtu.be/xbkxmVB41JA\
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/4Bkdq... 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Sowulo/
Website: https://sowulo.nl

DISCLAIMER. Awaken Realms does not claim any rights of the song - all rights go to their respective creator.
